lines.text: Gamma One is the Emperor's stool pigeon!
The rebels are unprepared for our attack. Signal Vice-Admiral Thrawn to launch his TIE squadrons immediately.
This rebel stronghold has no hope of escape! Commence the attack!
The Empire is on the verge of success. Soon peace and order will be restored throughout the galaxy. Even now our capable forces led by Darth Vader are striking back at the Rebel insurgents.
The importance of this mission cannot be overemphasized. The Emperor IS the Empire!
